term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/19/2000--Introduced. Native Americans Equal Rights Act - Repeals the Indian Preference Act and other specified provisions of law relating to Indian preferences with respect to Bureau of Indian Affairs and Indian Health Services positions, Federal grants and contracts, and civil rights law exemptions.
